players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "This is terrible! Alice was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who did this. Does anyone have any information or suspicions?"
You: "Without any concrete evidence, it's hard to say, but we need to be cautious. Diana, you were quick to speak up; do you have any clues or suspicions?"

Diana: "Bob, I spoke up because I'm genuinely concerned about finding the killer. Your immediate suspicion of me for trying to help seems defensive. Charlie's silence is also suspicious - why aren't you contributing to finding Alice's murderer?"
Charlie: "Bob, Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, why did you stay silent until now? Your late claim seems suspicious, and Diana's quick reaction might just be concern. We need more evidence."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
